explains: n. 长篇独白，独角戏；长篇大论，滔滔不绝的讲话
wordGroup: interior monologue n. 内心独白

sentences.en: His actions were accompanied by a rambling monologue.
sentences.cn: 他的行动伴随着一串冗长含糊的独白。

sentences.en: This is a monologue by a mower.
sentences.cn: 这是一个割草者的独白。

sentences.en: He went into a long monologue about life in America.
sentences.cn: 他开始滔滔不绝地谈起美国的生活。
